snippet: Retail currency brokers are considering operating in the United States after a nearly seven-year absence, if President Donald Trump is able to carry through on his pledge to deregulate financial markets....

headline.main: Walls, Drones and Mines: Turkey Tightens Border as Syria Incursion Deepens
headline.print_headline: Walls, Drones and Mines: Turkey Tightens Border as Syria Incursion Deepens

lead_paragraph: Retail currency brokers are considering operating in the United States after a nearly seven-year absence, if President Donald Trump is able to carry through on his pledge to deregulate financial markets.
